attributes.action: Illegal exclusions encourage prejudice in England's mainstream education
attributes.additional_details:
The Children's Commissioner has written a report "They Go the Extra Mile - Reducing inequality in school exclusions."

Illegal exclusions are unacceptable.

The Equality Act 2010 should be followed by all education professionals and given a higher priority compared to school league tables.

We want the Government to accept all the recommendations of the Children's Commissioner.
